start_game_accessible_label: Game Start. Press Enter or Space to begin, or touch the screen.
clippy_tip_1: Looks like you're exploring a portfolio. Want to see the Resume?
clippy_tip_2: Click on 'Projects' to browse my work.
clippy_tip_3: The 'Start' menu has everything you need. Donâ€™t be shy!
clippy_tip_4: You can drag windows around. Feels just like a real system!
clippy_tip_5: Need to talk to me? Send a message through 'WinMessenger'.
clippy_tip_6: Right-click on the desktop to organize icons.
clippy_tip_7: Iâ€™m definitely not a virusâ€¦ but 'virus.exe' might be.
clippy_tip_8: Use 'Internet Explorer or Google Chrome' to view my resume.
clippy_tip_9: Feeling artistic? 'Paint' is ready for your masterpiece.
clippy_tip_10: The 'Recycle Bin' is where bad ideas go.
clippy_tip_11: You can minimize windows to the taskbar to save space.
clippy_tip_12: Check out the 'Welcome' app for an overview of this system.
clippy_tip_13: This whole system is built with React and Tailwind CSS. Cool, right?
clippy_tip_14: Try the 'Konami Code' (Up, Up, Down, Down...) on the desktop!
clippy_tip_15: Switch to 'Game Mode' if you prefer an RPG adventure.
clippy_tip_16: Donâ€™t forget to check the 'Projects' folder for more info.
clippy_tip_17: If you get lost, just restart the system from the Start menu.
login_icon_alt: Mew profile icon with a cat
login_desc: Type a user name and password to log on to Windows.
login_help_tooltip: No password or username required. Just click OK.
boot_2: Copyright MewMew/2026 - Inspired by Windows 95 with some cool pixels.
boot_3: C:\> MewMew is testing extended memory...
boot_5: I prefer Linux but windows makes me feel nostalgic
errorBoundary_desc: A fatal exception has occurred. The current application will be terminated.
errorBoundary_hint: Press any key to continue explicitly does nothing. However, you can try to restart the system.
errorBoundary_contact: If it persists, contact your system administrator.
about_description: Front-End Software Engineer focused on accessibility, performance and pixel-perfect interfaces.
project_sue_desc: Promotional Website for a Game Studio
project_pocket_desc: Landing page built with Next.js and Tailwind
game_instructions: Use arrow keys or touch to move the character. Explore the room!
game_event_computer_found: You selected my computer â€” would you like to explore my web projects?
game_event_videogame_found: You selected my video game â€” would you like to explore my game projects?
game_msg_started: Game started. Use arrows to move.
game_sr_description: Top-Down Explorer Game. Use the arrow keys to move the green character. The goal is to explore and find treasures.
new_content_available: New content available, click on reload button to update.
blue_screen_fatal_exception: A fatal exception 0E has occurred at 0028:C0011E36 in VXD VMM(01) + 00010E36. The current application will be terminated.
blue_screen_terminate: Press any key to terminate the current application.
blue_screen_ctrl_alt_del: Press CTRL+ALT+DEL to restart your computer. You will lose any unsaved information in all applications.
blue_screen_press_any_key: Press any key or touch screen to continue _
boot_press_key: PRESS ANY KEY TO START SYSTEM...
messenger_security_msg: To prevent computer viruses, never accept files from strangers.
messenger_nudge: â€” You just sent a Nudge. â€”
notepad_default_text:
Welcome to Windows 95 Web Edition.

Type here.
welcome_intro: This is a functional recreation of the classic Operating System interface.
shutdown_question: Are you sure you want to:
safe_to_turn_off: It is now safe to turn off your computer.
shutdown_restart_hint: Refresh the page or press the button below to restart.
pwa_install_message_bold: Install this portfolio as an app?
pwa_install_message_description: Get quick access from your desktop or home screen with offline support.
game_intro_controls: Welcome! Use [WASD] or [Arrow Keys] to move. Click or Tap to interact.
game_intro_welcome: Welcome to Larissa's Portfolio, also known as Mewmew â€” a front-end developer passionate about crafting interactive experiences!
game_intro_context: This project is a collection of my favorite creations. On the computer, you can explore my web projects. In the video game, you will discover my web-based games, and in the backpack, you can view my resume.
game_intro_controls_fun: Ready regarding your mission? Use your Mouse (Click), Finger (Tap) or Keyboard (WASD/Arrows) to guide my character!
game_keyboard_hint: Navigation: WASD to Move, Esc to Exit
mc_empty_desc:
> No save data found.
> Press [X] or [SPACE] to create new save file.
seo_description: Front-End Software Engineer with experience building interactive retro experiences: Windows 95 Desktop, PlayStation 2, Games, and Paper/Curriculum. Focused on accessibility, performance, and maintainable front-end architecture.
about_tech_stack: Technical Stack: React 19 + TypeScript + Tailwind v4
about_feat_window: Custom Window Management: Drag, resize, minimize, maximize with z-index control
about_feat_wcag: WCAG 2.1+ Compliant: Full keyboard navigation, screen reader support, ARIA live regions
about_feat_perf: Performance Optimized: Code splitting, lazy loading, < 200KB target
about_feat_monitor: Real-time Monitoring: Web Vitals tracking (CLS, FID, FCP, LCP, TTFB)
about_why_desc: This portfolio demonstrates advanced frontend engineering through a nostalgic Windows 95 interface. It's not just about aestheticsâ€”every technical decision showcases real-world skills applicable to modern web development.
about_why_1: Complex state management without external window libraries
about_why_3: Production-ready architecture with proper separation of concerns
about_arch_1_desc: Built custom window system from scratch to demonstrate:
about_arch_2_desc: State management distributed across specialized contexts, composed via OSContext:
about_arch_2_li_5: FileSystemContext: In-memory virtual file system with persistence
about_wcag_sr_1: ARIA Live Regions: Status updates via AnnouncementContext
about_wcag_sr_3: Descriptive Labels: Full coverage of aria-labels for icon-only buttons
about_wcag_sr_4: Focus Management: useFocusTrap and roving tabindex for grids
about_wcag_kb_1: Tab navigation through all interactive elements
about_wcag_kb_4: Escape to close dialogs and menus
about_wcag_vis_1: Color Contrast: 7.2:1 ratio (WCAG AAA) for menu items
about_wcag_vis_2: Focus Indicators: High-contrast white outline + black shadow
about_perf_code_1: Lazy Loading: All pages loaded with React.lazy()
about_perf_code_2: Chunk Separation: Vendor, i18n, and game bundles
about_perf_code_3: Dynamic Imports: Heavy components loaded on demand
about_perf_run_msg: Run npm run analyze to view interactive bundle breakdown
about_perf_vitals_desc: Real-time performance tracking with color-coded console output:
desktop_nav_hint: Use arrow keys to navigate between icons.
game_event_backpack_found: You selected my backpack! Want to read the Curriculum inside?
paper_text_body: Innovative Front End Engineer with a passion for building pixel-perfect, accessible, and performant web experiences. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS architectures. Proven track record of delivering high-quality user interfaces that delight users.
paper_cupcake_ipsum: Cupcake ipsum dolor sit amet liquorice fruitcake. Candy canes jelly beans sweet roll cupcake lollipop. Powder carrot cake toffee brownie.
resume_summary_content: Front-End Developer specializing in creating accessible, responsive, and SEO-optimized interfaces. Experienced in Angular (8+), React, WordPress, and React Native. Solid knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, and good practices like SOLID and Clean Code.
resume_exp_job1_company: F1RST Digital Services (Remote, Global) | July 2025 â€“ Present
resume_exp_job1_desc: Development of BaaS portal with Angular, focusing on scalability and accessibility (WCAG). Pixel-perfect implementation with Design System.
resume_exp_job2_desc: Developing interactive and accessible interfaces using React/Next.js and WordPress.
resume_exp_job3_company: Clarke Energia (Remote, Brazil) | Mar 2024 â€“ Oct 2024
resume_exp_job3_desc: Developed the company's Marketplace with React and TypeScript. Refactored components for the Design System.
resume_edu_college1_desc: Focus on modern interfaces, UX/UI, and web technologies.
resume_edu_college2_desc: Specialization in UX/UI and digital illustrations.
resume_vol_desc: Volunteer tutor supporting LGBTQIAPN+ people in career transition to technology.
